name: Between the Ages
description:
Between the Ages is a mystery VR game about time travel and how your past informs your future.

Created for Culture Bytes: Plantain Prologue Jam

After his Grandma goes missing, young Malcolm is lead to play games and finds mysterious locked drawers in the house. After being instructed to eat a plaintain, Malcolm time travels thirty years into the future.  Unbeknownst to him, the plantain imbues with the ability to travel in time and switch between ages - the same ability his grandmother has. Fueled by these delicious plantains, Malcolm embarks on a journey to learn about his family's heritage, the truth behind Grandma’s disappearance, and ultimately accept his destiny.

Oculus Rift/Quest 2 Touch Controller:

✧ use Left trigger button to teleport around ✧

 ✧ use Left or Right grip button to pick up items ✧
